title: Send daily weather updates via a push notification using the Pushcut node
author: Harshil Agrawal
workflow_json: {"id":"82","name":"Send daily weather updates via a push notification using the Pushcut node","nodes":[{"name":"Pushcut","type":"n8n-nodes-base.pushcut","position":[1050,420],"parameters":{"additionalFields":{"text":"=Hey! The temperature outside is {{$node[\"OpenWeatherMap\"].json[\"main\"][\"temp\"]}}Â°C.","title":"Today's Weather Update"},"notificationName":"n8n"},"credentials":{"pushcutApi":"Pushcut Credentials"},"typeVersion":1},{"name":"OpenWeatherMap","type":"n8n-nodes-base.openWeatherMap","position":[850,420],"parameters":{"cityName":"berlin"},"credentials":{"openWeatherMapApi":"open-weather-map"},"typeVersion":1},{"name":"Cron","type":"n8n-nodes-base.cron","position":[650,420],"parameters":{"triggerTimes":{"item":[{"hour":9}]}},"typeVersion":1}],"active":false,"settings":{},"connections":{"Cron":{"main":[[{"node":"OpenWeatherMap","type":"main","index":0}]]},"OpenWeatherMap":{"main":[[{"node":"Pushcut","type":"main","index":0}]]}}}
readme: This workflow allows you to send daily weather updates via a push notification using the Pushcut node.
